|brand = ASUS |model = RT-AX59U |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = (RT-AX4200) |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 04/01/2023 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/ASUS_RT-AX59U |wlclass = AX42002R |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = 90IG07Z0-MO3C00 |fcc_id = MSQ-RTAX5S00 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7986AV;Filogic 830; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 2.0 GHz <!-- 2.0 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 64-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25N01KV; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Nanya;K4A4G165WF; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = MediaTek;MT7531AE; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 3 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = C8:7F:54 |oui = C8:7F:54
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, USB 3.2 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = <!-- Connector Type --> |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wi-Fi 6, HE160, AiMesh |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 11/15/2022 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0BSL945RN |asin_country = GB |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Vietnam

|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1chip2 = MediaTek;MT7976DA; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax |axqam1 = <!-- AX-qam --> |rad1ax = 574 |nqam1 = 600 |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2chip2 = MediaTek;MT7976DA; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |axqam2 = 3603 |rad2ax = 2402 |acqam2 = 2600 |rad2ac = 867 |nqam2 = 600 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Reviews=== *[https://urouter.ru/review/asus-rt-ax59u.html ''ASUS RT-AX59U AX4200 WiFi 6 Router'' on '''uRouter'''] :CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT7986A, 4x @2.0GHz (''Filogic 830'') :WLAN: [[MediaTek]] MT7976D, 2T2R 2.4/5GHz or 3T3R 5GHz *[https://www.techradar.com/reviews/asus-rt-ax59u ''ASUS RT-AX59U AX4200 WiFi 6 Router'' on '''TechRadar''']
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/asus/asus_rt-ax59u |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/asus/rt-ax59u |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/t/openwrt-support-for-asus-rt-ax59u/154666 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = mediatek |subtarget = filogic |arch = aarch64_cortex-a53 |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = auto |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
==See also== ===Tech Specs=== Per ASUS says N at 450 and 600 yet 2.4 radio is 2x2
*Network Standard :802.11a, 802.11b, 802.11g :WiFi 4 (802.11n) :WiFi 5 (802.11ac) :WiFi 6 (802.11ax) :IPv4, IPv6
*Product Segment :AX4200 ultimate AX performance: 574 + 3603 Mbps
*Data Rate :802.11a: up to 54 Mbps :802.11b: up to 11 Mbps :802.11g: up to 54 Mbps :WiFi 4 (802.11n): up to 450 Mbps :WiFi 4 (802.11n) (256QAM): up to 600 Mbps :WiFi 5 (802.11ac): up to 2600 Mbps :WiFi 6 (802.11ax) (2.4GHz): up to 574 Mbps :WiFi 6 (802.11ax) (5GHz): up to 3603 Mbps
*Transmit/Receive :MIMO technology :2.4GHz 2x2 :5GHz 3x3
[[Category:English Documentation]]
